product.title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Atlantis: The Lost Empire

Milo Thatch knew Atlantis was real, but no one would believe him. His grandfather spent years looking for the lost city. Finally, armed with a notebook his grandfather had left, Milo leads an expedition to Atlantis and finds more than a lost city. Atlantis: The Lost Empire is not only a classic adventure book, but a tale of strength and courage.

Tie-in Activity: Milo uses The Shepherd's Journal to unlock the mysteries of Atlantis. After reading the book with your child, ask him to imagine what Atlantis was like. Write down his thoughts in a journal that the two of you make using construction paper and notebook paper. He can decorate the cover any way he wishes. Soon, he'll have created an imaginary land all his own.
